name: Drakkar
overview: Erik is the last of a generation of brave Viking warriors. Now is the time to prove the reason for his existence: become the king of his people. To do this, he must maintain a tough fight against his gods, who force him to carry out his mission in a very limited time. Erik will travel on the "Drakkar" through time, and will return to Roman times where his adventures will take place. Drakkar follows the scheme of a classic video-adventure with collection of objects and many screens, and contains skill elements in which the slightest mistake or jump out of time will make you lose a large amount of energy.
